1.content:
Scarlett Johansson groaned as her eyes slowly opened.

         "What happened?" She moaned as she sat up. The last thing the young actress remembered was getting ready for a photo shoot. Scarlett was even still dressed for it with an open white blouse that exposed her belly, breast, and black bra; and of course the very short green shorts that showed off her lovely legs. The lovely lady's cute feet were even completely bare.

         Looking around at her surroundings Scarlett's grogginess soon faded as her eyes widened in horror and she quickly scrambled onto her feet.

         "This can't be real," Scarlett whispered to herself. She tried to rub her eyes in denial of what she was seeing. However, soon Scarlett could not deny the fact that her surroundings were gigantic. In fact the lovely lady estimated that she herself was about an inch tall now. Not only that but Scarlett was now located...
1.title: Waking Up

info.brief_description: A tiny actress plus hungry animals equals dinner time.
info.description:
The lovely Scarlett Johansson finds herself mysteriously shrunk to an inch in height. To make matters worse all the animals in the area are hungry and she is perfect for a bite sized snack. How long can Scarlett survive at the bottom of the food chain before she finds herself in the belly of a hungry animal?

Scarlett Johansson as she appears in this story: https://pics.wikifeet.com/Scarlett-Johansson-Feet-727583.jpg

Rules:
1.) Scarlett is not immune to digestion.
2.) Scarlett is known to have a fear of birds and cockroaches so make sure encounters with such animals have the appropriate reaction.
3.) Soft vore is preferred.
4.) No Nudity.
5.) Scarlett must eventually be consumed in some way.
6.) Have Fun!
